items.title: Electrical & Mechanical Design & Consultancy
items.text: End-to-end Design and consulting services for all Electrical and Mechanical systems.

items.text: Reliable implementation of all electrical and mechanical works, from installation to commissioning.

items.text: Design, fabrication, and installation of high-quality electrical panels, including Distribution boards, Control Panels and MCCs built to international standards.

items.title: Automation Solutions
items.text: Smart automation systems, including PLC controls and industrial process optimization.

items.title: Low Current Systems
items.text: Design, supply and installation of low curremt systems, including CCTV, Access control, Fire alarm, Evacuation, BMS, ensuring safety and seamless integration.

items.title: Solar Systems
items.text: Design, supply and installation of solar power systems for residential, commercial and industrial applications.

items.title: HVAC Systems
items.text: Complete HVAC services, including system design, supply and installation ensuring energy-efficient climate control and air quality.
